summary: An old but serious miscarriage of justice clouds a current police investigation looking into the death of a mutilated corpse.
cast: Nick Cheung|Simon Yam|Janice Man|Kay Tse|Chi Kui Chow|Hei-Yi Cheng|Chi-Yeung Chow|Phat Chan|Julius Brian Siswojo|Ho Ming Luk|Clifton Kwan|Ka-Lok Wong|Kim-Wing Lee|Ladnongkhee Adul|Anthony Au|Yuen-yee Man|Juno Leung|Ellen Liu|Nicholas Atkinson|Mike Leeder|David Clive Balcer Oxley|Wai-Keung Tung|Alex Lee|Chi-Wai Lai|Mason Chiu|Meg Cheung|Vinson Lam|Zoe Lee|Wylie Chan|Piggy Chan|Michael Wong|On-On Yu|Shawn Dou|Tian Zhuang Shuang|Chia-Hui Liu|Jun Kung|Ken Lo|Kwok Keung Cheung|Ying Kwan Lok|Cheuk-lap Hung|Cherry Ngan|Yuk-Keung Kwok
director: Director: Roy Hin Yeung Chow (as Chow Hin Yeung)
title: Dai jui bou
